ta.title: எதிர்ப்பாளர்கள் பொலிஸ் மற்றும் கண்ணீர் வாயுவால் தாக்கப்பட்டனர்

en.title: Protesters were attacked by police and tear gas
body_lines: Police have also attacked the protest of the principals of the principals.

summary_lines: Protesters faced police violence, including tear gas attacks, while police also targeted principal-led protests.
